title: Kamalam Jhumka - A Regal Fusion of Tradition and Modernity
materials: Coral. Features a lustrous Hyderabadi Polish.
features: This exquisite Jhumka showcases a stunning lotus (Kamalam) motif at the top, meticulously handcrafted with ruby petals and a central Polki diamond. The Jhumka bells feature alternating coral and pearl strands, meticulously arranged. The Polki diamonds are set in a closed setting, enhancing their natural brilliance. This piece blends traditional temple jewelry design with modern sensibilities, creating a truly unique heirloom.

description: This Jhumka is a testament to exceptional craftsmanship, showcasing the artistry of Hyderabadi jewelry making. The use of Polki diamonds, known for their unique charm and historical significance, adds to its value. The combination of vibrant colors and traditional motifs makes it a timeless piece that will be cherished for generations. Its durability ensures it can be passed down as a precious family heirloom.
